attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All over the country regional ITV television is being lost.
I have just heard that our local news that is bad enough in it's coverage of Kent and Essex is now instead of being three different programmes across a large south east region.Being merged into one programme covering from Dorset to Essex. We here in Sussex struggle to find any coverage of our county. And now we learn it is to get worse.
The Government must step in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
